name: Zethan
description: Zethan is next-generation gaming and NFT ecosystem bringing gamers together on zksync. ZETH is purchased on the open market using 25% of revenue from the treasury monthly. This keeps ZETH under persistent buying pressure. To participate in Zethan governance and earn, $ZETH tokens must be locked. Revenue will be used for future collaborations, buy-backs, promotions, and incentives. In governance, staking $Zeth gives you veZETH, a token that signifies your participation. You can use it to make proposals and vote on the future of the DAO.
